ygData.msgSnippet: The CR chamber that held Lunarpine and Shadow Wing opened Lunarpine caught the lifeless body, lifted it up on his shoulders and started toward the exit. Might

The CR chamber that held Lunarpine and Shadow Wing opened Lunarpine 
caught the lifeless body, lifted it up on his shoulders and started 
toward the exit. "Might as well give it a decent send off." he 
thought. He didn't know if what he'd experienced had been real or a 
hallucination brought on by his injuries. he was still a little 
groggy, he didn't know how long he'd been out of circulation. He 
passed the CR chamber that held Spears "Such a waste of energy, 
having to fix ourselves after battles which should never have been 
fought to begin with.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> She went into the ship and went to a CR chamber.  She needed to 
> finish repairing.
